mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop (shop_name, shop_lat, shop_lng, shop_type, shop_info, shop_vendor) VALUES (#{shop_name}, #{shop_lat}, #{shop_lng}, #{shop_type}, #{shop_info}, #{shop_vendor})
mapper.select: SELECT *, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians(${param2}) ) * cos( radians( shop_lat ) ) * cos( radians( shop_lng ) - radians(${param3}) ) + sin( radians(${param2}) ) * sin( radians( shop_lat ) ) ) ) AS distance FROM shop HAVING distance < ${param1} ORDER BY distance
